articles.title: About
articles.contents:
The Statistics Graduate Student Union is a student group at the University of Toronto which represents graduate students (MSc and PhD) in the Department of Statistical Sciences. We organize events for our graduate students and represent their interests to the university. We have organized the annual Statistics Student Research Day, jointly with the Department, since 2010.
Contact
Email: sgsudoss[at]gmail.com

articles.title: STATISTICS GRADUATE STUDENT UNION

Coming events
News
September 16, 2023: Mandy Yao has been elected President of the SGSU for the 2023-24 academic year. Mandy begins her term immediately.
June 22, 2022: Liam Welsh has been elected President of the SGSU for the 2022-23 academic year. Liam will begin his term in July.
April 11, 2022: The 12th annual Statistics Student Research Day will be held this year on May 25th, 2022. For information about the event, click here.
